channel.title: Soundcloud Pulse
channel.description: I'm sure plenty of you use it, SoundCloud Pulse. It let's you check SoundCloud notifications, stats, add tags, and see your top listeners, on the go without having to log into SoundCloud on your computer. Well, it isn't letting me add tags, this is worrying. Since that's the ground of where people find my music in the first place. Anyone having the same problem?

item.title: Soundcloud Pulse
item.dc:creator: anon6476606
item.description:
Yep that could be a problem! I got it for Christmas though so you could technically do that; I believe they also lower the price to like $50 a year from $63 a year during the Christmas season. Obviously a lot of the Auxy producers are like 12-16 and don’t have PayPal. But I was just listing what Pro gives you.

Read full topic

item.description:
The only problem with that @stereofield, you have to pay with PayPal to get SC pro and I’m 13 years old and don’t have a PayPal account

Read full topic

item.title: Soundcloud Pulse
item.dc:creator: anon6476606
item.description:
The possibilities and features are:

  • Cool little badge thing
  • 2x upload time
  • Ability to disable comments
  • You can hide play counts for everyone else
  • Spotlight up to 5 tracks or playlists
  • stats, by specific user and country

Normal Pro Costs:

  • $7/month
  • or $56.7/year — save 32%
  • Sometimes they change the price, so look for yourself https://soundcloud.com/pro

Then there’s the next level, Pro Unlimited

  • Everything from Pro plus…
  • UNLIMITED uploads
  • Stats by CITY
  • see specific websites that play your content (e.g. disco.auxy.co, soundcloud.com, etc)

Pro Unlimited Costs:

  • $15/month
  • or $135/year — save $45
  • Sometimes they change the price, so look for yourself https://soundcloud.com/pro

Read full topic

item.description:
Not on the app on mobile, it always tells me to purchase Pro for more “Possibilities and features” or something like that. I can add tags on Pc though, so I guess that’s fine.
